title: Font Combination used in yearbook: Edison High School
content:
[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829211513im_/http:/i.imgur.com/XC44fAj.png "Hosted by imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829211513/http:/imgur.com/XC44fAj)

The secondary font I believe it to be Edmondsans. Correct me if I'm wrong. Let me know the other font. Thanks!
author: dontbugme

comments.content:
Primary: **[Sign Painter House Slant](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829211513/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=SignPainter%20HouseSlant%20-%20Regular&fid=ab8dc2a00a296dd44ec8ab0136c26dbf&fsize=60&text=BABY%2C%20ITS%20COLD%20OUTSIDE&wrap=2)** by House Industries  
"WINTER..." looks like **[Gotham (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829211513/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Gotham%20-%20Black&fid=80d5397ddfd5d0407adb1b98f877800f&fsize=60&text=WINTER%20FORMAL&fit=1)** by H&FJ
